definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: In this thesis, by utilizing excimer laser annealing (ELA) crystallization, the study ofp-Si has been deployed mainly.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要展開了應用準分子激光晶化多晶硅的研究。

sentences.english: Granular polysilicon is a very useful form factor.
sentences.chinese: 粒狀多晶硅是一個非常有用的生產因素。

sentences.english: Sony already has low-temperature polysilicon TFT capability.
sentences.chinese: 索尼已經有生成低溫多晶硅TFT液晶的能力。

sentences.english: Photoetching polysilicon forms force sensitive resistance bar.
sentences.chinese: 多晶硅經光刻後便形成力敏電阻條。

sentences.english: One should try to avoid running metal over poly gate. As this cause to increase in parasitic capacitance.
sentences.chinese: 避免金屬在多晶硅柵上走線，會增加寄生電容。

sentences.english: The device utilizes three-phase construction, with the technology of buried-channel and four-layer polysilicon.
sentences.chinese: 該器件採用三相結構，埋溝和四層多晶硅技術。

sentences.english: The aggregation is a count of members.
sentences.chinese: 多晶硅是細小硅晶的集合體。

sentences.english: In a poly plant, security is another problem.
sentences.chinese: 在多晶硅廠，安全也是一個很大的問題。

sentences.english: The device utilizes three phase construction with the technology of buried channel and three layer polysilicon.
sentences.chinese: 該器件爲三相結構，採用埋溝和三層多晶硅技術。

sentences.english: The result: Polysilicon prices fell by half from January peaks.
sentences.chinese: 結果是，多晶硅價格從1月份的峯值下跌了一半。

sentences.english: The production process for making poly silicon mainly includes directional solidification and casting methods.
sentences.chinese: 多晶硅錠的製備工藝主要包括定向凝固法及澆鑄法。

sentences.english: Gettering is an effective method to reduce the deleterious metal impurity from multicrystalline silicon(mc-Si).
sentences.chinese: 吸雜是減少多晶硅中有害金屬雜質的一種有效手段。

sentences.english: An optimized condition for defect passivation by the hot-wire technique was established.
sentences.chinese: 優化了熱絲法氫處理多晶硅鍺薄膜工藝條件。

sentences.english: She estimdined ond that sconstituteerskies of polysilicon in the Chinese market will revery 60.000 tons this year.
sentences.chinese: 她忖度本年在中國市場出賣的多晶硅將會抵達噸。

sentences.english: In this paper, growth and recrystallization of silicon films on ceramic substrates were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了陶瓷襯底上多晶硅薄膜的生長和區熔再結晶。

sentences.english: Multicrystalline silicon (mc-Si) has become the dominant material for solar cells.
sentences.chinese: 當前多晶硅已成爲最主要的光伏材料。

definition: non-ferrous metals (all metals excluding iron, chromium, manganese and their alloys)
